captions.text:
<em>>>WELCOME BACK TO WAKE UP USA!</em>
>>OH THANKS EVERYBODY FOR COMING BACK,

BUT BEFORE WE MOVE ON, LET'S JUST
SAY THANK YOU TO

YOU ONE MORE TIME TO JEREMY.
THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR COMING ON.

>>OH, WELL THANKS FOR HAVING ME, LINDA.
AND DON'T FORGET, YOU CAN BUY MY BOOK

"HOW I GROW PERFECTION"
ANYWHERE THAT SELF-HELP

BOOKS ARE SOLD.
>>THAT'S GREAT.

HEY JEREMY DO YOU THINK I COULD EVER GROW
A MOUSTACHE

AS GOOD AS YOURS?
[LAUGHTER] >>NO.

>>THAT GUY.
THAT'S GREAT.

WELL PAUL, ARE YOU FEELING OKAY?
THAT MUST BE YOUR EIGHTH GLASS THIS MORNING.
>>WELL LINDA, I'M COMPETING IN A MARATHON THIS WEEKEND SO I'M TRYING TO DRINK AS MUCH

WATER AS POSSIBLE.
>>OH.
SPEAKING OF WATER, OUR NEXT GUEST OWNS A NIAGARA FALLS TOURING COMPANY, SO HE'LL GIVE US

THE INSIDE SCOOP AND MAYBE
CONVINCE THIS GUY TO

FINALLY GO ON A VACATION.
RIGHT?

[LAUGHTER] >>WELL HE CAN CERTAINLY TRY.
DON'T GO ANYWHERE BECAUSE WE'LL BE RIGHT

BACK AFTER THE BREAK.
>>ACTUALLY, PAUL, THANKS TO OUR NEW
CORPORATE SPONSOR, WE'LL NO LONGER BE TAKING COMMERCIAL BREAKS UNTIL AFTER THE SHOW IS

OVER.
>>NO BREAKS?

[LAUGHTER] WHAT ARE WE ROBOTS?
I MEAN, I GOT TO TAKE CARE

OF SOMETHING.
PRESSING.

>>AH, WHATEVER IT IS, I'M SURE IT CAN
WAIT UNTIL AFTER THE SHOW.

>>WELL THAT DEPENDS.
PUN INTENDED.

>>ALL RIGHT.
JAKE THANKS SO MUCH FOR COMING ON.

>>THANKS FOR HAVING ME.
>>HEY!

SIT DOWN AND TELL US ABOUT NIAGARA.
>>OH, OKAY.

WELL, I LOVE THE ENTHUSIASM.
ALL RIGHT WELL FIRST I WANT YOU BOTH TO CLOSE

YOUR EYES AND VISUALIZE 600,000
GALLONS OF WATER CRASHING

DOWN.
NOW IMAGINE EXPERIENCING THAT POWERFUL FLOW
OF WATER FOR YOURSELF.

>>WOW.
>>AH.

>>OKAY.
MAN WE CAN TELL SOMEONE'S THINKING

ABOUT GOING TO NIAGARA, AM I RIGHT?
YOU KNOW WHAT PAUL?

YOU SHOULD JUST GO!
>>N-NO.

NO.
>>REALLY THOUGH!
JUST STOP FIGHTING IT AND GO ALREADY!

>>I'M GOOD.
>>REALLY. THE VIEWERS WILL UNDERSTAND.

>>NO THEY WON'T.
[LAUGHTER]

>>CLEARLY YOU'RE UNDER A LOT OF PRESSURE.
THIS IS THE BEST WAY TO JUST RELIEVE ALL THAT

STRESS.
>>OKAY.

OKAY.
>>YOU KNOW?

YOU KNOW WHAT I'M SAYING.
>>YOU KNOW WHAT THEY SAY ABOUT NIAGARA.

ONCE YOU GO, YOU CAN'T STOP GOING
OR IT'LL HURT REALLY BAD.

>>YES.
>>REALLY?

IS THAT REALLY WHAT THEY SAY JAKE?
>>YEAH, WELL THAT'S THE NEW SLOGAN.

THE ORIGINAL WAS JUST, "SHHH....AH."
BUT IT JUST DIDN'T MAKE ANY SENSE.

>>HEY IS THERE ANYTHING NIAGARA'S
FAMOUS FOR BESIDES THE FALLS?

>>OH SURE!
YEAH.

BOTTLED WATER.
>>NO!

>>ALL RIGHT!
>>WELL WHY DON'T YOU PUT YOUR HAND IN THIS

BOWL HERE.
>>NO.

I'M GOOD.
>>GO AHEAD PAUL.

>>COME ON PAUL, LIVE A LITTLE.
THERE YOU GO.

>>NOTICE HOW THE NIAGARA WATER IS COLD AND
REFRESHING.

>>THAT'S NICE.
>>AND THE OTHER GUY'S WATER IS JUST WARM.

YEAH.
>>OH.

>>VERY WARM.
>>YOU KNOW, PAUL IS TRAINING

FOR A MARATHON.
I BET HE'D LOVE TO DRINK THAT WATER YOU

KNOW?
>>YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT I WANT LINDA.

>>THERE YOU GO PAUL.
DRINK UP.

THERE WE GO.
>>OH YEAH.

>>AND BECAUSE OUR WATER IS SO
CLEAN IT JUST SHOOTS

RIGHT THROUGH YOUR SYSTEM.
>>OKAY.

[GASPING] >>DO YOU HAVE ANY POINTERS
FOR FILLING UP WATER BALLOONS?

>>OH SURE!
YEAH.

>>OKAY AWESOME.
>>OH SURE, WHY NOT?

THAT'S NOT RANDOM AT ALL!
>>OH LOOK AT THAT!

>>OH THE KEY IS TO MAKE THEM AS BIG AS POSSIBLE,
JUST KEEP GOING.

BIGGER, YEAH, EVEN MORE.
EVEN MORE.

>>IT'S GOING TO EXPLODE!
>>YEAH.

WELL WATER BALLOONS ARE SUPPOSED TO EXPLODE.
>>I'M NOT TALKING ABOUT THE WATER BALLOON.

>>ALL RIGHT!
WELL THAT'S LOOKING REAL GOOD.

PAUL.
THANK YOU SO MUCH JAKE.

>>OH, MY PLEASURE.
>>IT'S BEEN GREAT HAVING YOU.

ALL RIGHT AND NOW AS PROMISED,
WE'LL HAVE ROB KELLY KARATE

SPECIALIST COME ON AND
DEMONSTRATE SOME OF HIS MOVES ON PAUL!

>>WHAT?
>>YEAH.

MAKE SURE TO PUNCH HIM REAL HARD IN THE STOMACH.
GIVE IT TO HIM.

>>OH.
[KARATE SOUNDS] >>OH!
>>YEAH.
